Question: This person became acquainted with members of the famous orchestra in Mannheim, the best in Europe at the time.
Hints: There is a photofit of this person, created from four contemporary portraits.
This person faced a very difficult task in getting his father's permission for the marriage.
Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky wrote his Orchestral Suite No. 4 in G, "this personiana" (1887), as a tribute to this person.
